title: FS: T205 Gold Border - EDDIE COLLINS "Mouth Open" - REDUCED
author: h2oya311

posts.post_title: FS: T205 Gold Border - EDDIE COLLINS "Mouth Open" - REDUCED
posts.post_content:
Up for sale is the following 1911 T205 Gold Border of HOFer Eddie Collins:

1911 T205 Eddie Collins "Mouth Open" = $145

This short-print card is at the top of the list for all T205 collections. The card is in Good condition with perfect centering and wide borders.  Please see high quality photos for any condition flaws.

Paypal "gift/friend" preferred. I'll take care of all shipping charges. First to e-mail me at [url]h2oya311@yahoo.com[/url] and say "I'll take it" will be the new owner! 

Thanks for looking.

[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/derekgrangerfirstalbum/1911%20Collins%20T205_1.jpg[/IMG]   [IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/derekgrangerfirstalbum/1911%20Collins%20T205%20_back2_.jpg[/IMG]
